dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Cover title: Mitchell's national maps of the United States. "Drawn by J.H. Young. Engraved by J.H. Brightly." Second sheet has title: A concise view of the number, resources, and industry of the American people in the year 1840. Insets on 1st sheet: Map of the north-eastern boundary of the United States according to the Treaty of 1842; Map of the southern part of Florida; Population of each county, &c., in the different states and territories of the United States, in 1840. Historic Maps copy 1 folded in cover, 18 x 12 cm. Historic Maps copy 1 imperfect: map of U.S. wanting.
dc_publisher_s: Philadelphia : Published by S. Augustus Mitchell, 1843, c1842.
dc_title_s: Mitchell’s national map of the American republic or United States of North America. Together with maps of the vicinities of thirty-two of the principal cities and towns in the Union [sheet 1]
